name: ProPetro Holding Corp.
description: ProPetro Holding Corp. is a leading provider of hydraulic fracturing services to onshore oil and natural gas exploration and production companies in North America. Founded in 2007 and headquartered in Midland, Texas, ProPetro specializes in providing high-performance well completion services across the Permian Basin, one of the most productive oil regions in the United States. The company utilizes cutting-edge technology and equipment to deliver efficient and reliable hydraulic fracturing services, which are crucial for maximizing the extraction of hydrocarbons from unconventional reservoirs. ProPetro is committed to operational excellence and safety, aiming to enhance the productivity and profitability of its clients while minimizing environmental impact. The company has a strong focus on innovation and has adopted advanced technologies, including digital monitoring systems and eco-friendly solutions, to improve service delivery and sustainability. With a robust fleet of specialized equipment and a skilled workforce, ProPetro is well-positioned to meet the increasing demand for energy in a dynamic market. The company’s mission is to be the preferred service provider in the hydraulic fracturing market by consistently delivering high-quality services and fostering long-term relationships with clients.

seo.meta_title: ProPetro Holding Corp. | Hydraulic Fracturing Services
seo.meta_description: Explore ProPetro Holding Corp., a leading provider of hydraulic fracturing services in North America, committed to operational excellence and sustainability in the oil and gas sector.

faq.question: What services does ProPetro provide?
faq.answer: ProPetro provides hydraulic fracturing services to oil and natural gas exploration and production companies.

faq.question: Where is ProPetro headquartered?
faq.answer: ProPetro is headquartered in Midland, Texas, USA.
